Our financial results for the quarter ended 30th June 2025 are out!

We delivered a topline growth of 10%, with double-digit net profit growth.

Newsflash! #TataConsumerProducts #Q1FY26 are out.

Revenue from Operations at INR 4,779 Cr., up 10%

Consolidated EBITDA at INR 615 Cr., down 8%

Group Net Profit at INR 332 Cr., up 15%

Full results here: https://t.co/7yH0BaPApt

Our financial results for the Quarter and Year ended 31st March 2025 are out!

We delivered a topline growth of 17% for the Quarter and 16% for the Year, growth was broad based across India and the International Business.

View the full results here: https://t.co/1qLHsqMopT

#TataConsumerProducts #FY2024-25

Newsflash! #TataConsumerProducts results for the Quarter and Year ended 31st March 2025 are out.

Revenue for the Quarter at INR 4,608 Cr., up 17%, For the Year at INR 17,618 Cr., up 16%.

Consolidated EBITDA for the Quarter at INR 625 Cr., down 1%, For the Year at INR 2,502 Cr., up 8%.

Group Net Profit for the Quarter at INR 349 Cr., up 64%, For the Year at INR 1,287 Cr., up 6%.

Full results here: https://t.co/1qLHsqMWfr

We continued our strong momentum on innovation with a number of new product launches across food and beverages in Q2 FY 24, further expanding our total addressable market. Here’s a quick look at what we launched during the quarter.

#TataConsumerProducts #BusinessUpdates #Q2FY24 https://t.co/GenepS8wiC

In Q2 FY24, we achieved new milestones in our sales & distribution journey. With a total reach of 3.8m outlets, we almost doubled our reach since September’20 & also strengthened our rurban focus.
Know more - https://t.co/fQlmtmP7zS https://t.co/KGFyRYvzZD

Our MD & CEO, Sunil D’Souza speaks to @nikunjdalmia, @AyeshaFaridi1 and @avannedubash on @ETNOWlive, on our performance in Q2 FY 24 across India and International businesses, consumption trends, focus on high growth businesses and expanding our product portfolio.
